channel.title: Connecting using stm32f4 newest firmware fails?
channel.description:
basically, i powered up my stm32f4discovery, flashed new (modded for stm32f4discovery) firmware, but now the axoloti software says this when i hit connect:
USB device found connected Cannot validate authenticity, no signature present. Firmware version: 1.0.0.1, crc=0xA593D902, entrypoint=0x20011000 Ping: WaitSync Timeout, disconnecting now Disconnect request
i'm running win8.1 by the way, if that helps finding the issue?

item.title: Connecting using stm32f4 newest firmware fails?
item.dc:creator: @Inaba ramon
item.description:
@Inaba wrote:

i did compile and upload the modded firmware in dfu mode as stated, leds do blink, user button had no result.

but what i found out just now is that i can get it to work by switching the usb in different ports? weird, but i got it to work!

i can use it again

Read full topic
item.source: Connecting using stm32f4 newest firmware fails?

item.title: Connecting using stm32f4 newest firmware fails?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Did you compile the firmware after modding? Do the leds blink? Could you try holding the user button while powering up?

Read full topic
